title: Modern Love: 10 Contemporary Romances by Rising Stars
description: When love calls, it’s rarely easy but always memorable, and definitely worth turning the pages. Recapture the thrill, the delicious anticipation of finding your happily ever after in these 10 unforgettable, hot stories by some of today’s brightest names:Her Knight in Black Leather – J.M. StewartDestination Wedding – Robyn NeeleyDrawn to Jonah – Jennifer DeCuirOn the Fly – Katie KenyherczWildly – Debra KaynFalling for You – Heather ThurmeierBeginning Again – Peggy BirdSpiraling – Rachel CrossSave My Soul – Elley ArdenSweet Gone South – Alicia Hunter Pace
author: J.M. Stewart
